titleStmt.title: An answer to a foolish pamphlet entituled A swarme of sectaries & schismaticks. Put forth by John Taylor the water-poet. Wherein is set downe 1. An epistle to John Taylor. 2. Iohn Taylors armes, blazed by Fennor. 3. George Hattons lines sent to Iohn Taylor. 4. The view of his long silence. 5. The view of his writing this booke. 6. A view of the title. 7. A view of Iohn Taylor in the tub. 8. A view of his Puritans. 9. A view of his hypocrisie. 10. An exhortation to Iohn Taylor to repent.
titleStmt.author: Walker, Henry, Ironmonger.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
